scripts.celery:worker: source ./venv/bin/activate && watchmedo auto-restart --directory=. --pattern=*.py --ignore-patterns="./zane_api/tests/**" --recursive -- celery -A backend worker -E -l info
scripts.celery:beat: source ./venv/bin/activate && watchmedo auto-restart --directory=. --pattern=*.py --ignore-patterns="./zane_api/tests/**" --recursive -- celery -A backend beat --loglevel=info --scheduler django_celery_beat.schedulers:DatabaseScheduler
